column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: HRH Princess Norodom Bopha Devi was taken for cremation this morning in a funeral cortege through the capital.------The princess ------passed away ------from natural causes in Thailand on November 18
column4: aged 76.------She was then cremated at 9.50 am with members of the royal family and government in attendance.------Photos:  Love Visal and Elm Vathanak via ------AKP
